title: [PS3] SBK Generations
description:
<a href="http://www.sbkthegame.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.sbkthegame.com</a>

"FEEL THE BEST SBK EXPERIENCE"
The official game of the FIM Superbike World Championship is back on PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 with the most complete motorcycling simulation ever created. Live through the last four seasons, including the new 2012 season, of the SBK world championships: become world champion, try the new SBKÃ‚â„¢ Experience mode, and win the brand new one-manufacturer races. With SBKÃ‚â„¢ Generations, Milestone has developed a masterpiece: the definitive motorcycle game!
FEATURES

    OFFICIAL MODE: live the glamour of the official Superbike championship! Race as one of the SBK, Supersport and Superstock 1000 riders on the most famous tracks in the world, and rewrite the history of the seasons from 2009 to 2012.
    CAREER MODE: take your rider through the championships from 2009 to 2012, starting in the lower classes and riding your way up to the top, where the title of World Champion awaits!
    SBKÃ¢â€žÂ¢ EXPERIENCE: a unique and innovative experience that will take you into the world of motorcycling through exciting objective-specific challenges and one-manufacturer races against the best riders in the world, Legends included!
    ONLINE: experience all the thrills of a real Superbike race, challenging up to 15 players online.
